title: Ukraine war: Dozens feared dead after bomb hits school
description: A Ukrainian official says 60 people may be dead after an air strike on a village school in Luhansk.

title: 'We tried not to watch' - escapees recount terror of Russian-occupied Izyum
description: Two women recall what happened when Russia took over a strategically-important city in the Donbas.

title: War in Ukraine: Zelensky WW2 speech accuses Russia of Nazi atrocities
description: The Ukrainian leader compares Russia's invasion of his country to wartime Nazi bombings.

title: Ros Atkins on... Why 9 May matters to Russia
description: Ros Atkins explains why Victory Day is such an important date in Russia.

title: Two held in manhunt for axe attackers who killed three Israelis
description: Israeli police say the Palestinians were found hiding in bush near Elad where the attack took place.

title: EasyJet to take out seats so it can fly with fewer crew
description: The airline plans to remove a row of seats so that it can fly with fewer cabin crew on board.

title: Sri Lanka: The protests unifying a nation where ethnic fault lines run deep
description: Unprecedented protests in Colombo are unifying a nation where ethnic fault lines run deep.

title: Hong Kong's John Lee: Ex-security chief becomes new leader
description: John Lee's appointment is being seen as a move by China to tighten its grip on the city.

title: New Mexico wildfire: Huge blaze could worsen this weekend
description: "Historic" extreme weather likely to stoke New Mexico fire, which is already the size of Chicago.

title: Kentucky Derby: 80-1 outsider Rich Strike pulls off historic upset
description: Rich Strike, a 80-1 outsider, won the race despite only being brought in after a horse dropped out.

title: UK YouTuber Benjamin Rich quizzed and fined at Russian space centre
description: Bald and Bankrupt vlogger Benjamin Rich says he was questioned by Russian police in Kazakhstan.

title: Brazil's Lula launches presidential campaign
description: The former Brazilian president says he wants to unite the country and defend its democracy.

title: Ukraine war: Returning to the place my father was killed
description: As Vadim and his father tried to rescue their dogs, they were fired upon by a convoy they believe was Russian.

title: Ukraine war: 'If this is true, then I am also a Nazi'
description: Holocaust survivors in the Ukrainian city of Uman feel insulted by Russian claims to be fighting Nazis.

title: Viewpoint: Putin now faces only different kinds of defeat
description: Russia's Victory Day parade won't represent any sort of victory over Ukraine, writes defence analyst Michael Clarke.

title: KwaZulu-Natal floods: The South African family who lost nine children
description: Mass funerals are held in South Africa after the country's most deadly natural disaster.

title: Philippines election: 'Politicians hire me to spread fake stories'
description: Voters in the Philippines presidential election are facing an onslaught of online lies.

title: Fergal Keane: How I found a way to live with PTSD
description: The BBC correspondent, who was diagnosed with PTSD in 2008, explores the effects of the condition and how it can be treated.

title: Who is Alina Kabaeva, Putin's alleged girlfriend?
description: The EU is proposing to sanction Alina Kabaeva, an ex-gymnast turned media boss close to President Vladimir Putin.

title: Ukraine war: Bono sings with soldier in Kyiv metro station
description: The U2 frontman was seen singing at a downtown metro station covering the hit track Stand by Me.

title: Ukraine war: Rebuilt Kyiv railway bridge a symbol of hope
description: A railway bridge close to Kyiv has been rebuilt, just a month after it was destroyed by Russian attacks.

title: The return of California's butterflies
description: Efforts to protect these beautiful insects include driving electric tractors and hand-rearing them in a lab.

title: Acid attack survivors in Mexico: 'Justice is not enough'
description: Carmen Sanchez launched her foundation in Mexico to help survivors of attacks rebuild their lives.

title: Australia election: Welcome to Durack, a seat six times bigger than Britain
description: Australians head to the polls on 21 May - and in Durack, it means a massive logistical effort.
